title: On the beautiful Portrait of Mrs. Foreman, as Pandora
description:
LibriVox volunteers bring you 9 recordings of On the beautiful Portrait of Mrs. Foreman, as Pandora by Thomas Gent.
This was the Weekly Poetry project for July 28, 2024.
------
Nothing is known about Thomas Gent's education but he worked in the office of the Victualling Department of the Navy at Yarmouth from about 1803. He printed various works at Yarmouth (1805-18) but moved back to London by the war's end or shortly after that. (Summary from University of Toronto Libraries, Jackson Bibliography of Romantic Poetry)
